name: Meteor Mash
description:
Meteor Mash is a 2D slingshot game about conquering the universe by destroying planets with your meteors!

Features

  • Click and Drag based action
  • Randomly activated planetary photon shields
  • Objective goal of destroying all planets while obtaining score
  • Score multiplier when multiple planets destroyed
  • Randomly spawned planets

Keyboard and Mouse Controls

  • Tab - starts game after reading instructions
  • Escape - quit the game
  • Left Mouse Click - hold over meteor to drag and release

How to Play

Hold down the Left Mouse Button while dragging your meteor in the opposite direction of where you would like to launch it. Let go of the Left Mouse Button and watch it fly through space, while trying to destroy the planets. Planets will randomly activate their photon shields, so be strategic on where you launch your meteors. Destroy several planets in a short period of time to gain a score multiplier to get a better score.
